subject: Zen and samurai [dis]connection
msgSnippet: I think some people are confusing Zen and Buddhism with Samurai.  They are mutually exclusive.  If you are into all that zen wa meditate become nothing

I think some people are confusing Zen and Buddhism with 
Samurai.  They are mutually exclusive.  If you are into 
all that 'zen' 'wa' 'meditate' 'become nothing' 'become 
the void' ETC.  STUDY ZEN.  Samurai are people. Mostly 
dead people.  You'd benefit yourself MUCH more to dedicate 
yourself to the study of Zen or Buddhism.
